Archaeological Site: MEDINET HABU (EXCEPT TEMPLE OF RAMESSES III)
Name: Statue of Shepenwepet
Description: This statue depicts Shepenwepet wearing a two-feathered crown decorated with a sun disk between two cow horns. She wears a long wig and a tight-fitting dress, and her left leg steps slightly forward. She holds a cylindrical object in her right hand, and a lotus flower, symbol of the goddess Isis, in her left hand.
